how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

info.url_png_icon_64x64: http(s) url to pool icon; not animated; max 40kb

about.me: Our operation started late in 2019, in the Heart of Texas the journey in the early days was mostly trial, error, perseverance and ambition.
about.server: The Servers are a Combination of Bare Metal and Cloud services, Some based in Texas and Others on Each Coast of the United States for Maximum Uptime.
